text: @PressSec You mean you people have a Heart ❤️ this Administration has a Heart? I wouldn't know this bc you People can't even put out a Fucking Tweet with Respect to the 150,000+ Americans who have already Died to #Covid19 the same fucking Virus that killed Herman Cain! WAFJ!
